text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea affinis is a plant species in the Dipterocarpaceae family endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea affinis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30817A9579896. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30817A9579896.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
